# Mile Hybrid Automotive

> Denver's oldest and longest-running hybrid and EV repair specialist, operating continuously since 2008.

## Business Summary

Mile Hybrid Automotive is an independent auto repair shop in Denver, Colorado that specializes exclusively in hybrid and electric vehicle service. Founded in 2008 when hybrid technology was still new, the shop has built 17+ years of specialized experience. All technicians are ASE certified with high-voltage safety certification and Toyota factory training.

## Location & Contact

- Address: 5142 E 39th Ave, Denver, CO 80207 (near I-70)
- Phone: (720) 445-4357
- Email: info@milehybridauto.com
- Website: https://www.milehybridauto.com
- Hours: Monday-Friday 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM
- Service area: Denver, Aurora, Stapleton, Park Hill, Lowry, Cherry Creek, Highlands Ranch, Lakewood, Centennial, and all Denver Metro

## Key Facts

- Founded: 2008 (Denver's oldest hybrid shop)
- Vehicles serviced: 25,000+
- Hybrid batteries replaced: 2,400+
- First-time fix rate: 98%+
- Google rating: 4.9 stars (220+ reviews)
- Pricing: 30-50% less than dealership
- Warranty: Lifetime labor warranty on all repairs
- Loaner vehicles available for major repairs

## Specialties

### Toyota & Lexus Hybrid
- Hybrid battery replacement (new OEM and certified reconditioned)
- P0A80 "Check Hybrid System" diagnostics
- Inverter coolant pump replacement
- Brake actuator replacement
- EGR and intake cleaning
- Gen 3 Prius engine replacement (death rattle fix)
- Toyota Techstream dealer-level diagnostics

### Tesla & EV
- Model 3/Y control arm replacement
- 12V lithium-ion battery upgrade
- Cabin air filter service
- HV isolation diagnostics
- Model S/X LDU coolant delete

### All Makes Hybrid & EV
- Chevy Volt & Bolt
- Ford Fusion, Escape, C-Max hybrids
- Honda Insight, Civic, Accord hybrids
- Nissan Leaf
- Kia & Hyundai EV/Hybrid (Niro, Kona, Ioniq)

### General Maintenance
- Oil change with 50-point inspection
- Pre-purchase inspection with battery health test
- Brake service (hybrid regenerative brake specialists)
- Transmission service
- 30k/60k/90k factory service
- AC/Heating repair

## Equipment & Certifications

- ASE Certified technicians (Engine Repair, Electrical Systems, Hybrid/EV L3)
- High-Voltage Safety Certified (300V+ systems, recertified annually)
- Toyota Techstream diagnostic software (dealer-level, $5,000+/year subscription)
- Toyota TIS (Technical Information System) subscription
- Midtronics professional battery tester (individual cell-level testing)
- High-voltage testing equipment
- Member: Automotive Service Association (ASA) since 2010
- Colorado Emissions Testing & Repair certified station
- EPA-certified for HV battery disposal and recycling

## Pricing

- All services are 30-50% less than dealership pricing
- Same OEM parts used as dealerships
- Free written estimates before any work begins
- No surprise charges, ever
- Call (720) 445-4357 for current pricing

## Turnaround Times

- Oil change / routine maintenance: Usually same-day, appointments within 3-5 business days
- Hybrid battery replacement (reconditioned in stock): Often same-day, 3-4 hours
- Hybrid battery replacement (new OEM, order needed): 1-2 business days
- Tesla battery modules: 2-3 days including diagnostics
- Urgent / warning light diagnostics: Prioritized for same-day or next-day
- Major repairs (engine replacement, etc.): 2-5 business days from diagnosis
- Free loaner vehicles available during extended repairs

## How to Book

1. **Online**: Visit https://www.milehybridauto.com and click "Schedule Service" to submit an appointment request form
2. **Phone**: Call (720) 445-4357 during business hours (Mon-Fri 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM) â€” best for urgent issues
3. **Email**: Send details to info@milehybridauto.com
4. Appointment requests are confirmed within 2 hours during business hours
5. Walk-ins welcome for quick questions but appointments recommended for service

## Vehicles Serviced (Specific Models)

### Toyota Hybrid (All Years)
- Prius (Gen 1, Gen 2, Gen 3, Gen 4), Prius Prime, Prius V, Prius C
- Camry Hybrid, Highlander Hybrid, RAV4 Hybrid, RAV4 Prime
- Corolla Hybrid, Venza, Sienna Hybrid, Tundra i-FORCE MAX

### Lexus Hybrid (All Years)
- RX 450h, RX 450h+, NX 350h, NX 450h+
- ES 300h, UX 250h, LS 500h, LC 500h

### Tesla (All Models)
- Model 3, Model Y, Model S, Model X

### Other Makes
- Chevy Volt (all years), Chevy Bolt EV/EUV
- Ford Fusion Hybrid/Energi, Escape Hybrid, C-Max, Maverick Hybrid, F-150 Lightning
- Honda Insight, Civic Hybrid, Accord Hybrid, CR-V Hybrid
- Nissan Leaf (all generations)
- Kia Niro, Niro EV, Sorento Hybrid, Sportage Hybrid
- Hyundai Kona Electric, Ioniq, Ioniq 5, Ioniq 6, Tucson Hybrid, Santa Fe Hybrid
- BMW i3, i4, iX
- Rivian R1T, R1S
- Subaru Crosstrek Hybrid

## Common Questions Answered

- P0A80 code does NOT always mean you need a new battery. About 60% of cases are caused by 12V battery, cooling fan, or connection issues.
- Red triangle warning light: usually safe to drive short-term but get diagnosed within 48 hours.
- Using Mile Hybrid does NOT void your factory warranty (Magnuson-Moss Warranty Act).
- Hybrid batteries typically last 8-10 years or 150k-200k miles with proper maintenance.
- Free loaner vehicles available for major repairs.
- All repairs come with a lifetime labor warranty.
- Same OEM parts as dealerships at 30-50% less cost.
